FileFormat.FormatDescription: The SampleVision format is native to the Turtle Beach SampleVision program. The format supports mono 16-bit audio and loop points.The Format was developed for use with the SampleVision software program, which was designed to send and receive samples via the MIDI interface on a PC. It consists of a variable-length header followed by a contiguous block of binary data representing the sound samples.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF; Offset: 0; Magic Bytes: SOUND SAMPLE DATA
